karthikeyand wrote:

> Hi,
>    When i do a ejb lookup inside the setUp() method of my testcase ,
> can i add a assertion to verify whether the lookup returns a not null
> value. And also can i add a fail in the catch block of the lookup
> code . For eg., can i have it like in the code below..

Yes, you can, although I recommend having a separate test for that case.

testCanGetHome
     ...
     assertNotNull(home)

testCanGetRemote
     ...
     assertNotNull(remote)

testUseRemote
     "the real test"...

That way if most of your EJB tests fail, then you can use your 
"testCanGet" tests to help you see the problem from a test report, 
without having to look at a stack trace.
